Test case Description: Verify system ingests email and creates work item
Test steps: 1. Send email from CAZ_Claims_UAT_FNOL with policy number and date of loss
Expected Result: 1. Work item is created in COSMOS DB and FNOL portal with correct fields

Test case Description: Verify system handles email missing policy number
Test steps: 1. Send email from CAZ_Claims_UAT_FNOL without policy number
Expected Result: 1. Work item is created in Unmatched status for manual review

Test case Description: Verify work item fields extracted from email are populated
Test steps: 1. Send valid email with subject, policy no, date of loss, attachments
Expected Result: 1. Work item shows sender, urgent flag, subject, date/time, policy no, date of loss

Test case Description: Verify behavior when urgent flag is not present in email
Test steps: 1. Send email without urgent flag header
Expected Result: 1. Work item created with default non-urgent state and note for manual check

Test case Description: Verify new work item status is To do and Unassigned
Test steps: 1. Send valid email to create work item
Expected Result: 1. Work item status = To do and assignee = Unassigned

Test case Description: Validate "Start a Claim" button and Assign to me dropdown
Test steps: 1. Select work item, click Assign to me, then click Start a Claim
Expected Result: 1. Work item becomes assigned to user and claim start flow initiates

Test case Description: Verify policy number, loss date and attachments are extracted and shown
Test steps: 1. Open policy search screen for extracted work item
Expected Result: 1. Policy number, date of loss and attachments are displayed and attachments downloadable

Test case Description: Verify attachments from email can be downloaded from work item
Test steps: 1. Select attachment on extracted email preview and attempt download
Expected Result: 1. Attachment downloads successfully and is readable

Test case Description: Search a General Liability policy after starting claim
Test steps: 1. Login, assign work item, start a claim, search General Liability policy
Expected Result: 1. Matching General Liability policy result appears

Test case Description: Search a Property policy after starting claim
Test steps: 1. Login, assign work item, start a claim, search Property policy
Expected Result: 1. Matching Property policy result appears

Test case Description: Search a Financial Lines policy after starting claim
Test steps: 1. Login, assign work item, start a claim, search Financial Lines policy
Expected Result: 1. Matching Financial Lines policy result appears

Test case Description: Search an Inland Marine policy after starting claim
Test steps: 1. Login, assign work item, start a claim, search Inland Marine policy
Expected Result: 1. Matching Inland Marine policy result appears

Test case Description: Search an Umbrella policy after starting claim
Test steps: 1. Login, assign work item, start a claim, search Umbrella policy
Expected Result: 1. Matching Umbrella policy result appears

Test case Description: Search a Contigent Lessor policy after starting claim
Test steps: 1. Login, assign work item, start a claim, search Contigent Lessor policy
Expected Result: 1. Matching Contigent Lessor policy result appears

Test case Description: Search an Excess Auto policy after starting claim
Test steps: 1. Login, assign work item, start a claim, search Excess Auto policy
Expected Result: 1. Matching Excess Auto policy result appears

Test case Description: Verify assigning an unmatched work item moves it to Assigned tab
Test steps: 1. Navigate to Unmatched screen and assign a work item
Expected Result: 1. Work item appears in Assigned tab under the assigned user

Test case Description: Verify terminating an unmatched work item moves it to Processed tab
Test steps: 1. Navigate to Unmatched screen and terminate a work item
Expected Result: 1. Work item appears in Processed tab and is no longer actionable

Test case Description: Verify merging an unmatched work item consolidates with existing work item
Test steps: 1. Select two related work items and perform merge
Expected Result: 1. Work items are consolidated and appear under the appropriate tabs

Test case Description: Validate work item card UI, tabs and color coding
Test steps: 1. Open FNOL portal and view Unassigned, Assigned, Processed, Unmatched tabs
Expected Result: 1. Cards display under correct tabs with expected colors and spacing

Test case Description: Verify status updates when moving cards between tabs
Test steps: 1. Move an Unassigned card to Assigned tab via UI interaction
Expected Result: 1. Card status updates to Assigned and appears under Assigned tab
